description: Biovision Africa Trust's Pharma Communication Program focuses on empowering smallholder farmers in Kenya and Tanzania through sustainable agricultural practices. Established in 2015, it utilizes various communication channels, including magazines, radio programs, and outreach centers, to disseminate knowledge and training. The program aims to enhance farmers' skills, promote ecological farming, and ultimately improve food security and livelihoods. By fostering partnerships and engaging with local communities, it seeks to create a more sustainable agricultural ecosystem.
name: Biovision Africa Trust
